Hess Tractor Trek is a side-scrolling 2.5D racing game for iOS and Android.

My role: Lead Game Designer and Producer

Hess Tractor Trek was developed on contract for Hess, to support their annual Hess Truck toy. The game featured and audio detection component which would allow the application to detect the honking / beeping sounds produced by the physical Hess truck toy. I served as game designer and producer on the project.
